    • How can I perform a regex search in Powershell?

    Â¶ How can I perform a regex search?

    You can check if a character contains a string by using the cmatch operator like so:

    $word = "Hello"
$word -cmatch "[A-Z]"
// True
    $word = "Hello"
$word -cmatch "[A-Z]"
// True
